error.message: The LINQ expression 'DbSet<Provider>() .Where(p => p.Distance( sLatitude: __location_Lat_0, sLongitude: __location_Long_1) <= p.AreaLocation)' could not be translated. Either rewrite the query in a form that can be translated, or switch to client evaluation explicitly by inserting a call to 'AsEnumerable', 'AsAsyncEnumerable', 'ToList', or 'ToListAsync'. See https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2101038 for more information.
